pressure_skewer.name: Pressure Skewer
pressure_skewer.desc: [Rapier] Flourishing an enemy causes your M1s to deal additional chip damage, blood loss, and makes your hits deal 3 extra true damage until you take damage.

defensive_stance.name: Defensive Stance
defensive_stance.desc: [Rapier] Gain more parry frames the lower your health is.

frenzied_dance.name: Frenzied Dance
frenzied_dance.desc: [Rapier] The more posture you currently have, the more chip and posture damage you deal.

duelists_lunge.name: Duelist's Lunge
duelists_lunge.desc: [Rapier] Running Basic Attacks deal increased posture damage. Upon landing your critical, your next running Basic Attack has increased range.
